import React, { useState } from "react"; import { createResident } from "../../service/Resident/apiResidentCreate"; const Fill_Info = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", dateOfBirth: "", gender: "", idNumber: "", passportNumber: "", issueDate: "", expiryDate: "", phone: "", email: "", address: "", serviceType: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await createResident(formData); if (response) { alert("Gửi thông tin thành công!"); setFormData({ fullName: "", dateOfBirth: "", gender: "", idNumber: "", passportNumber: "", issueDate: "", expiryDate: "", phone: "", email: "", address: "", serviceType: "", }); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error:", error); alert("Không thể kết nối với server. Vui lòng thử lại sau."); } }; return (
